name: Seriesfinale
tagline: SeriesFinale is a TV series browser and tracker application for the Maemo and MeeGo operating systems.
body:
============================================================
SeriesFinale is a TV series browser and tracker application
============================================================

:Authors: Joaquim Rocha, Micke Prag, and Juan A. Suarez

:License: SeriesFinale is published under the GNU GPL v3 license.

Copyright
==========

SeriesFinale is (c) 2009-2010 Igalia, S.L.

SeriesFinale is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify 
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by 
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or 
(at your option) any later version.

SeriesFinale is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, 
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of 
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the 
GNU General Public License for more details.

See the COPYING file for more details.

The placeholderimage.png and downloadingimage.png were taken 
from the Humanity icon set.
Humanity is designed and developed by Daniel For√© 
<Daniel.p.Fore@gmail.com>, Jonian Guveli <jonian.guveli@gmail.com>, 
and K.Vishnoo Charan Reddy<foo.mac.v@gmail.com>.

Humanity icons are licensed under GNU General Public License version 2.

Privacy Policy
==============

We, the developers behind SeasonFinale respects the privacy of our users. We want to make it very clear what information the app collects and what we use it for. 

In order to work, our application collects information about what tv shows you have added. This is our policy regarding that data:

* The application does not send this information to our servers and we do not track your viewing habits. 
* This information is only stored on your phone and will be deleted when you uninstall the application.
* We will not sell your personal information to anyone, for any purpose. Period.
* We're listening. You can send us questions or feedback about our privacy policy.

If any future updates of the app causes the information in this privacy policy to change, we will update this policy and post it to our site and in the app itself.

If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact Micke Prag <micke.prag@gmail.com>
